title: Law establishing the National Council for Science and Technology and Determining its Mission, Organization and Functioning
title_en: Law establishing the National Council for Science and Technology and Determining its Mission, Organization and Functioning

provisions.title: Article 35 - Commencement
provisions.content: This Law comes into force on the date of its publication in the Official Gazette of the Republic of Rwanda. Kigali, on 16/08/2017 (sé) KAGAME Paul President of the Republic (sé) MUREKEZI Anastase Prime Minister Seen and sealed with the Seal of the Republic: (sé) BUSINGYE Johnston Minister of Justice/Attorney General
